listItem: Built responsive, high-performance web applications using React, JavaScript (ES6+), and Tailwind CSS, ensuring cross-browser compatibility and accessibility.
Designed and developed reusable UI components to streamline development and maintain consistency across projects.
Integrated REST APIs and managed state with React hooks and Context API, improving data flow and user experience.
Optimized page load times and performance by implementing lazy loading, code splitting, and image optimization.
Collaborated with designers and stakeholders to translate wireframes and mockups into fully functional web pages with pixel-perfect precision.
Used Git/GitHub for version control and followed agile workflows to deliver iterative improvements.
